EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-18-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Jacksonville.ES-2018-01-09.EMAIL - Market
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Jacksonville Community Lunch & Golf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Dave Kranowitz, Vice President at Turbonomic, we are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on January 18th, at TPC Sawgrass for an afternoon of lunch and golf.
TPC Sawgrass is the No. 9-ranked resort golf course in the US and the top-ranked golf course in Florida. After lunch at the club house, we'll be teeing off on a must play course for golf fans around the world, Dye Valley, at 12:45 p.m.
Jacksonville Community Lunch & Golf <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
Where: TPC Sawgrass 110 Championship Way, Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida 32082 Tuesday, January 18th 11:30am
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
